snippet: A 20-year investigation into one of Mexico’s largest drug trafficking organizations came to a close Friday when Eduardo Arellano-Félix, a top operative of the gang, was extradited to San Diego.
abstract: Twenty-year investigation into one of Mexico’s largest drug trafficking organizations comes to a close when Eduardo Arellano-Felix, a top operative of the gang, is extradited to San Diego.
lead_paragraph: A 20-year investigation into one of Mexico’s largest drug trafficking organizations came to a close Friday when Eduardo Arellano-Félix, a top operative of the gang, was extradited to San Diego.

headline.seo: Mexican Drug Gang Suspect Extradited to the U.S.
headline.main: Mexico: Drug Gang Suspect Extradited to the U.S.
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Drug Gang Suspect Extradited to the U.S.
